data.name: Egypt Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
What can immerse you in the atmosphere of Ancient Egypt better than its music? Tracks composed for Predynastic Egypt and Egypt: Old Kingdom will carry you to the Nile Delta, to pharaoh’s gardens or to the hot savanna, thanks to the careful approach of our composer, Nadia "Insidewaves" Gurskaya:

“Predynastic Egypt is more meditative, it is about “a man and nature”. The second game is about “a man and a man”, the contact of tribes. That’s where the tempo and the richness of the melody come from. The first game soundtrack contains more short motives, freedom – the music imitating wind and letting the listener hear everything: the ambient sounds of the terrain and the weather. Egypt: Old Kingdom is about the flourishing of civilization, and the music adopts a clean rhythm, changes of mood, intense arrangement, and culminations.” ©Nadia Gurskaya


Tracklist:
1. Prophecy
2. Shadow Dance
3. Boisterous Savanna
4. Where We Come From
5. Ancestral Spirits *
6. Noon
7. Under the Skies
8. Tumble-weed *
9. Creation **

Total time 31:43

* Bonus tracks from Predynastic Egypt
** Album version of Egypt: Old Kingdom's Intro and Predynastic Egypt main menu
1-4,6,9 - Egypt: Old Kingdom
5,7,8,9 - Predynastic Egypt

data.short_description: Soundtrack collection from games Predynastic Egypt and Egypt: Old Kingdom
data.supported_languages: English, Russian, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista SP2
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024х768, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD analogues
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920х1080, 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9.5
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024х768, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920х1080, 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.8 Ghz or AMD Athlon X2 64 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024х768, 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i5 or AMD analogues
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920х1080, 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
